isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 1.7: VEHICLE FEATURES - IDLE SHUTDOWN

svcproc.title: IDLE SHUTDOWN
svcproc.para: This optional feature provides automatic engine shutdown after a 2 to 120 minute idle time has been exceeded.
The allowed Idle time can be customized to the owner's desire as well as maximum or minimum intake air temperatures at which extended idle would be allowed.

In an event that the Idle shutdown feature is triggered, the ECM will flash the Oil/Water light on the dash and sound the buzzer 30 seconds before the engine shuts down, to indicate the condition. A fault code will also be set after the shutdown is completed.
When this feature is selected, the Cold Ambient Protection feature is automatically disabled.
